perimeter_locations: Intersection 1: Deploy officers to control traffic flow east-west
Intersection 2: Deploy officers to ensure emergency vehicles have clear access north-south
Intersection 3: Deploy officers to maintain traffic control and provide support for emergency response efforts
Intersection 4: Deploy officers to secure the area and prevent unauthorized access
action_details: Based on the given information, a strategic perimeter has been planned with two officers deployed at each of the four intersections closest to the emergency site. They will focus on managing traffic flow and ensuring that emergency vehicles can reach the scene quickly and safely. One officer will be positioned as a spotter in a higher vantage point to provide real-time updates to the command center, enabling informed decision-making during the emergency response.
